content.raw:
I updated this pull request to reflect the recent changes made:

* It now uses `numpy_dtype_workaround`
* It includes the changes from the [Move connections.py to labscript\_utils](#!/labscript_suite/blacs/pull-requests/28) pull request
* It now includes python3 changes for the delete repeated shots plugin
content.html:

  • It now uses numpy_dtype_workaround
